\SetAPI{J}
\section{database.pool.maxwait}
\label{configuration:DatabasePoolMaxwait}
\ClearAPI
Maximum timespan in ms in which a database connection should be received. Valid values are numbers > 0, default is 30000.

\type{de.osthus.ambeth.persistence.config.PersistenceConfigurationConstants.DatabasePoolTryTimeSpan}
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{database.pool.maxwait}}]
